Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near Ewing/98th
ShortDescription: 30 S Chgo buses temp. rerouted SB: Ewing,98th, Ave L, 100th, and Ewing; NB: Ewing, 100th, Ave M, 98th, and Ewing due to, police activity near Ewing/98th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Ewing/98th, due to police activity.

Southbound buses will operate via Ewing,98th, Ave L, 100th, and Ewing.

Northbound buses will operate via Ewing, 100th, Ave M, 98th, and Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.
